attributes.action: Reduced use of gas and electric in a house means lower bills but the more we try and save money the utility company's put the price up
attributes.additional_details: The more the public try and cut there utility bill by watching what they use on Gas and Electristythe more the utility companies bump up the prices as they lose out on profit as we are using less. Is this fair on the public? Try a d save money but because profits get hit the orice goes up.... And we can not do anything to stop this. Not only does this work with gas and electric but also petrol they can see we ha e to have it a s we use our cars less so they put the price high to make there profits.... This should be looked at straight away as the public are not being heard.
